scripts.//build: Building react locally for sandbox is just like production. Staging is the outlier
scripts.build-production: npm run -s build-react-production && npm run -s build-server
scripts.build-staging: npm run -s build-react-staging && npm run -s build-server
scripts.build-react-staging: pushd . && cd ../client && PUBLIC_URL=/staging npm run build && popd
scripts.build-react-production: pushd . && cd ../client && PUBLIC_URL='' npm run build && popd
scripts.//deploy: PUBLIC_URL for react-app static assets. If more variables are needed, switch to using env-cmd
